query:
SELECT r.* 
                    FROM message_references r 
                    INNER JOIN messages m ON r.message_id = m.id WHERE
                        m.channel_id = $1
                    AND
                        ($2::BIGINT IS NULL OR m.id < $2)
                    AND
                        ($3::BIGINT IS NULL OR m.id > $3)
                    AND
                        ($4::BIGINT IS NULL OR m.author_id = $4)
                    ORDER BY m.id ASC LIMIT $5
